sentences.en: a vicious slander on the company's good name
sentences.cn: 对那家公司良好声誉的恶意诽谤
亚历山大受到恶意的诽谤.

sentences.en: He accused me of slandering him and trying to undermine his position.
sentences.cn: 他指控我诽谤他并想削弱他的地位。

sentences.en: He angrily accused the investigators of slandering both him and his family.
sentences.cn: 他气愤地指责调查者诋毁他和他的家人。

sentences.en: He is being sued for slander .
sentences.cn: 他被控犯有口头诽谤罪。

sentences.en: He threatened to go public with the slander.
sentences.cn: 他威胁要把丑闻宣扬出去.

sentences.en: He was the kind of person who would flatter you to your face, and then slander you behind your back.
sentences.cn: 他是那种当面胁肩谄笑.背地里造谣中伤的人.

sentences.en: I gave my ear to what I now know was the malice of slander.
sentences.cn: 我过去听信了谣言,现在我知道那是恶意中伤.

sentences.en: Mr. A charged Mr. B with bribery and Mr. B countercharged Mr. A with slander.
sentences.cn: 某甲控诉某乙受贿,而某乙反诉某甲诽谤.

sentences.en: No man should reproach, revile, or slander another man.
sentences.cn: 人们不应羞辱, 辱骂, 或诽谤他人.

sentences.en: No matter how they slander us, we will never give in.
sentences.cn: 不管他们怎样诽谤我们, 我们决不让步.

sentences.en: That story about her is nothing but wicked slander!
sentences.cn: 关于她的传闻纯属恶意诽谤!

sentences.en: The article is a slander on ordinary working people.
sentences.cn: 那篇文章是对普通劳动大众的诋毁.

sentences.en: The article is a slander on us.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章是对我们的诽谤.

sentences.en: You might as well slander Fred.
sentences.cn: 你对弗莱德无异是落井下石.

sentences.en: You ought to kick back at such malicious slander.
sentences.cn: 你应当反击这种恶毒的污蔑.

sentences.en: You speak continually against your brother and slander your own mother's son.
sentences.cn: 你坐着毁谤你的兄弟,谗毁你亲母的儿子.

sentences.en: You won't slander the political consciousness of the people of Harlem.
sentences.cn: 你不会低估哈莱姆区人民的政治觉悟了.
